title: Market share of selected TV stations in Germany 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Audience market share on the Y-axis for 8 different TV Channels for 2 groups Total audience (3 years and older), and 14-49 years that are presented on the X-axis.
In TV Channel ZDF, Total audience (3 years and older) had the highest Audience market share 127.0 among the 2 groups and in kabel eins, 14-49 years had the lowest Audience market share 5.0.
In TV Channel RTL, 14-49 years had the highest Audience market share among all 8 TV Channels and it has the lowest Audience market share in TV Channel kabel eins.
The maximum Audience market share for 14-49 years that was found in TV Channel RTL was 23.8 times larger than the minimum Audience market share observed in TV Channel kabel eins.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Audience market share on the Y-axis for 8 different TV Channels for 2 groups Total audience (3 years and older), and 14-49 years that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Total audience (3 years and older) had the highest Audience market share in TV Channel ZDF and 14-49 years had the lowest Audience market share in TV Channel kabel eins.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Audience market share on the Y-axis for 8 different TV Channels for 2 groups Total audience (3 years and older), and 14-49 years that are presented on the X-axis.
In TV Channel ZDF, Total audience (3 years and older) had the highest Audience market share 127.0 among the 2 groups and in kabel eins, 14-49 years had the lowest Audience market share 5.0.
In TV Channel RTL, 14-49 years had the highest Audience market share among all 8 TV Channels and it has the lowest Audience market share in TV Channel kabel eins.
The maximum Audience market share for 14-49 years that was found in TV Channel RTL was 23.8 times larger than the minimum Audience market share observed in TV Channel kabel eins.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 8 different TV Channels on X-axis for 2 groups Total audience (3 years and older), and 14-49 years. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Audience market share.
In TV Channel ZDF, Total audience (3 years and older) had the highest Audience market share 127.0 among the 2 groups and in kabel eins, 14-49 years had the lowest Audience market share 5.0.
Among all the TV Channels, 14-49 years had the highest Audience market share 119.0 in TV Channel RTL and lowest value 5.0 in TV Channel kabel eins.
The maximum Audience market share for 14-49 years that was found in TV Channel RTL was 23.8 times larger than the minimum Audience market share observed in TV Channel kabel eins.

Among the groups, Total audience (3 years and older) had the biggest difference in Audience market share. Where the maximum Audience market share was 4.38 times larger than the minimum Audience market share.
On average, the TV Channel RTL had the highest Audience market share for all 2 groups Total audience (3 years and older), and 14-49 years. Whereas RTL II had the lowest average Audience market share.
